note.p: Education: Wadham College, Oxford; BA (1672), MA (1675), BMed (1678), DMed (1682)
Career: Fellow of Wadham (1674); Professor of Anatomy, Oxford; moved to London (1684); Physician, St Bartholomew's Hospital, London (1697-1707)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Hunter; Foster

Notes: Proposed by Sir Christopher Wren; Robert Plot. DNB gives death date as 13 Jan 1712-3, whereas index to BR gives 13 Jan 1711/12; Hunter gives 1713 and says that he had withdrawn in 1707 and had been admitted 8 Apr 1685. LI has a Robert Pitt, gent, arm, admitted 1705
